Class Heart

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • net.jordaria.Heart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Heart
extends java.lang.Thread
    A thread that constantly fires tick events.
    Author:
    Ches Burks

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Called automatically. If the thread is running, it will call beat().
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • beat

        public void beat()
        Fires a Tick event and then waits for a set time.

      • terminate

        public void terminate()
        Stops the thread from executing any code. This should be called before stopping the thread for thread safety.
